content: {"name": "Salvation Army - Jersey City", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* They may ask for social security card, but it is not required\n* Serves Jersey City residents", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/new-jersey/jersey-city/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "562 Bergen Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "McGinley Square", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07304", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.71984440000001, "longitude": -74.0735681}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 435-7355", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}]}
